channel.title: Hiring on Haney Codes .NET - Sharing my experiences as a developer and engineering manager.

item.title: New Blog & Hiring Needs
item.description: It’s been a while Well I failed badly in my mission to blog every week of 2017. I guess life and stuff just got in the way in the end. I’ll try to be more consistent in the second half of 2018. Anyway, I bring some news: I have a new blog engine, and we are hiring at Stack Overflow! New blog engine I was previously using WordPress but had many issues and concerns with it.
